item.description:
Lydia would like to host a play gourp/impromptu get together with kids in
Newton on the MLK holiday Monday at about 4pm. The forecast is
for rain, but if it's not raining we live across the street
from a park, and if it is raining we'd love to have kids over
for a playgroup

(I can send my address to anyone who RSVPs).

My (Lydia's) son is 3.5, but kids of all ages would be welcome, and anyone
who doesn't have their kids or has no kids but wants to meet
other group members would be welcome to come too! Look forward
to meeting some of you!

Lydia

group.name: Boston/Burbs Life after Divorce Social Group

item.name: Impromptu--playgroup in Newton on MLK Day 4pm
